title: U.S. population share by generation 2018
summary: The U.S. population Generations in the by generation was Generations The_Baby_Boomer_Generation_(born_1946-1964) , who made 27.68 share .
The most population Generations was The_Millennial_Generation_(born_1981-1996) , with just 0.64 share .

In second place was Generations The_Silent_Generation_(born_1928-1945) with 7.47 share ; third place went to Generations The_Greatest_Generation_(born_before_1928) with 0.64 share ; fourth place went to Generations Generation_Z_(born_1997_and_later) with 27.68 share and fifth place went to Generations Generation_X_(born_1965-1980) , who made 20 share .
gold: The statistic depicts the distribution of the U.S. population in 2018 , by generation . In that year , Millennials made up about 22 percent of the population in the United States .
